<h1 ><picture><img src="https://github.com/7oSkaaa/7oSkaaa/blob/main/Images/about_me.gif?raw=true" width="30px"></picture> Who I Am:🚀</h1>
<h2>🌟 Hey There! I’m Sam Christopher</h2>
<h3> 🫸Full Stack Engineer | Software Developer🫷 </h3>
<p>I’m here to make tech easy and enjoyable. <br>
  I work on everything from interactive websites <br>
  to backend setups, always with a focus on <br>
  making things run smoothly..</p>

  👨‍💻 Love building and deploying great apps

  📑Documenting my coding journey, one bug at a time

   📖Always learning, always debugging🐞

  📬 Get in Touch:  
  Mail me at "samchris.in@gmail.com" or
  through website https://sam-chris-portfolio.netlify.app/
